name: Bad Game (SrRaaffa)
description:
You are a Frog, and you wanna Cherries because is good, so you need to catch them all and go to the next levels. this game have 10 levels and i dont make the sprites.

i just made this game to learn Unity so its have many bugs, and i just upload this game because a friend mine wanna download it. but if you play this please make a comment saying how bad this game is.
